name: Sravika Ponduru
top_product: Our Top Product is fully customised diamond engagement rings and bridal jewellery sets. Each piece is designed from scratch, using certified diamonds and hallmark gold, ensuring exclusivity, elegance, and perfect personalisation for every client.
ideal_referral: My Ideal Referral is: ✨ Brides-to-be, grooms-to-be, or families planning a wedding ✨ Anyone celebrating a major milestone—anniversary, birthday, engagement ✨ Individuals looking for premium personalised gifts ✨ Customers wanting to redesign old jewellery into modern styles Anyone who says: “I want something unique” is a perfect referral for Sravika Diamonds.
top_problem_solved: We solve the biggest problem in jewellery buying: “I can’t find exactly what I want in an affordable price." Clients often struggle with: ✔ Designs that don’t match their taste ✔ Lack of customization options ✔ Confusing pricing for diamonds and gold ✔ Redesigning old or sentimental jewellery At Sravika Diamonds, we provide: ✔ Bespoke design with 3D previews ✔ Transparent pricing ✔ Certified stones ✔ Personalised craftsmanship ✔ Customisation within budget We turn the dream jewelry in their mind into a masterpiece they can wear.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my most memorable BNI moments came through a referral from a fellow chapter member who is a professional makeup artist. She was working closely with a bride who wanted jewelry that truly matched her personality and her wedding looks—but she wasn’t finding anything unique in the market. My member instantly thought of Sravika Diamonds and connected us. From the very first consultation, the bride shared her dream: two distinct bridal looks, each meaningful and elegant in its own way. Together, we designed her complete jewelry ensemble—right from the choice of diamonds and gold, to the intricate detailing, to making sure each set perfectly complemented her outfits and style. We created: ✨ A traditional, graceful wedding Gold set for the ceremony ✨ A modern, contemporary look Diamond set for her reception When she saw the final pieces, she became emotional. She said the jewellery felt like her story, her identity, and her joy captured in every detail. For me, that moment was priceless. This experience reminded me why BNI works so beautifully— trusted relationships lead to meaningful referrals, and meaningful referrals allow us to create unforgettable moments.
